vlive.korean: 기본적인 베이스가 다른데 어떻게 그래? How is that possible when the basis is different? 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 아이유 분노의 시승식!
vlive.english: How is that possible when the basis is different?

vlive.korean: 그냥 기본적인 체력 관리라 해야 되나? but I think it's just taking care of the basic things on my body? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 다시 🐢
vlive.english: but I think it's just taking care of the basic things on my body?

vlive.korean: 형님! 그냥 기본적인 거잖아요 - 너 감자 소금 찍어 먹어, 설탕 찍어 먹어? Hey, that's a default! - Do you eat potatoes with salt or sugar? 듣기 View video BTS : 슙디의 꿀 FM 06.13 with J-HOPE #0613FM_0523
vlive.english: Hey, that's a default! - Do you eat potatoes with salt or sugar?

vlive.korean: 개인 그냥 기본적인 본인소개를 해달라는 말이었어요 - 밥 안 드셨어요? I just meant to give a basic introduction. - You didn't eat? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 안녕 몬베베🐢
vlive.english: I just meant to give a basic introduction. - You didn't eat?

vlive.korean: 이건 기본적인 거고 그거 어때요? That's the basics. How about that? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처3 깜짝 영상05_포항 시장님의 예능감
vlive.english: That's the basics. How about that?

examples.korean: There are three fundamental principles of teamwork. 발음듣기 협동 작업에는 세 가지 기본적인 원칙이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There are three fundamental principles of teamwork. 발음

examples.korean: They were given only rudimentary training in the job. 발음듣기 그들은 그 직장에서 가장 기본적인 훈련만 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were given only rudimentary training in the job. 발음

examples.korean: They were imprisoned and deprived of their basic rights. 발음듣기 그들은 투옥되어 기본적인 인권조차 박탈당했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were imprisoned and deprived of their basic rights. 발음

examples.korean: Many of the houses lacked even basic amenities. 발음듣기 많은 집들이 기본적인 생활 편의 시설도 안 되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many of the houses lacked even basic amenities. 발음

examples.korean: The literal meaning of ‘petrify’ is ‘turn to stone’. 발음듣기 petrify의 기본적인[문자 그대로의] 뜻은 ‘돌이 되다’이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The literal meaning of ‘petrify’ is ‘turn to stone’. 발음
